content: विक्रांत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Stepped or passed beyond. {@--2@} Powerful, heroic, valiant, chivalrous. {@--3@} Victorious, overpowering (one's enemies). --तः {@--1@} A hero, warrior. {@--2@} A lion. --तं {@--1@} A pace, stride. {@--2@} Heroism, valour, prowess. {@--3@} The jewel called वैक्रात.
